overview.title: GreenCheck
overview.description: GreenCheck is a Chrome extension that identifies websites powered by green energy. It adds an icon to search results, showing which sites use green energy, and provides detailed info on the sources.

tabOne.description: See if the current website uses green energy and discover the sources behind it.

beforeLicenseKeyEntry.description: Unlock premium insights with your license key. Get a detailed analysis of the web pageâ€™s carbon emissions and tips to reduce its carbon footprint.

explanationCard.title: Unlock Advanced Features
explanationCard.description: Upgrade for in-depth analysis of websites' carbon emissions. A one-time purchase gives insights and tips for greener browsing.

afterLicenseKeyEntry.description: You now have access to the Carbon Analysis tab, providing detailed carbon emissions data and tips for greener web pages.
